entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
